# Introduction

ryx function calculates correlation between one outcome variable and a group of independent variables, respectively, and evaluate these correlations with their statistical significance. 


# Example 

Below is an example code of how to use this package


```{r setup}
library(ryx)

library(MASS)
x <- ryx(Boston, y="medv")

print(x)
summary(x)
plot(x)
```
